author: Kyle Cailteux
comment: I absolutely love this watch face! There's one problem though, and I don't know if it's a problem with the watch face or Android wear, but sometimes when in ambient mode, it doesn't draw black and white mode. The screen gets "stuck" when the screen goes into ambient mode.. I'd love to see this issue resolved! Great work!
title: Room for improvement

author: Tijana Stojkovic
comment: Not only is this watch face cool as it is but you can customize it also! 😍
title: Love it!

author: Erik Johansson
comment: I imagine that if the windspeed actually was 295 km/h I would not be able to go outside...
title: Looks nice but wrong data

author: Munky Roger
comment: Nice face. Colors galore. Compliments any situation.
title: Very nice

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your helpful feedback.
I'd like to try to fix what you mentioned.
so, would you please send us details of your situation,screen capture of it.
Please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

author: Justin Price
comment: Looks okay color options are limited. I like all the info it provides but not functional

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
You can choose ambient color from 7 colors.
Thank you.

title: Looks cool but not functional

author: B. Jones
comment: Tried this with my moto360 second gen when the one for Android wear would not work right, and what do you know, there both not working as advertised.  I cannot select the watch face.
title: Didn't work as advertised
